name: Document 1
text: Diego Pitsillidis is an experienced software developer with a strong academic background. He specializes in .NET and Angular development, handling both front-end and back-end tasks throughout the software development lifecycle. His professional roles include full-stack and junior developer positions where he has implemented scalable web applications, integrated AI capabilities, and managed agile development processes. Diego continuously hones his skills through certifications and side projects, demonstrating proficiency in modern development tools and technologies.
